I have sent an email reminder to john@example.com about the first meeting at Room 1, asking John to be there on time.

distance.description: The distance in meters from the location to search for restaurants.

The system generates a list of recommended movies for John, which includes movies like 'The Dark Knight', 'The Matrix', 'The Lord of the Rings', 'The Hangover', 'Knives Out', 'Deadpool', 'The Shawshank Redemption', 'Forrest Gump', and 'Joker'.
